text: A Coruña (, ) is one of the 59 constituencies () represented in the Senate, the upper chamber of the Spanish parliament, the Cortes Generales. The constituency elects four senators. Its boundaries correspond to those of the Spanish province of A Coruña. The electoral system uses an open list partial block voting, with electors voting for individual candidates instead of parties. Electors can vote for up to three candidates. ==Senators== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! colspan="3"| Senators for A Coruña 1977– |- | colspan="3"| {| class="navbox collapsible collapsed" style="text-align:left; font-size:100%; width:100%; float:left; border:0; margin-top:-1px;" |- ! colspan="2" style="background:#FDFDFD;"| Key to parties |- | style="font-size:95%; border:solid 1px silver; padding:8px; background:white;"| |} |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" !
